mapper.sql: select id, enable, create_by, create_time, update_by, update_time, remark, sort, activity_id, user_id, status from activity_user_sign
mapper.select:
select aus.id,aus.activity_id as "activityId",aus.user_id as "userId",aus.status,a.user_type as "userType",a.name, a.integral,a.start_time as "startTime",a.end_time as "endTime",a.address,a.contact_person as "contactPerson",a.phone,a.headFigure from activity_user_sign aus LEFT JOIN activity a ON aus.activity_id = a.id
aus.enable = 1 and user_id = #{userId}
and #{date} between a.start_time and a.end_time
and #{date} > a.end_time
ORDER BY aus.update_time DESC

select aus.id, aus.activity_id as "activityId", aus.user_id as "userId",au.id, au.nickname,au.avatar, DATE_FORMAT(aus.create_time,'%Y-%m-%d') as "createTime", aus.status from activity_user_sign aus LEFT JOIN all_user au ON aus.user_id = au.id where aus.activity_id = #{activeId} ORDER BY aus.update_time DESC

select aus.id,aus.activity_id as "activityId",aus.user_id as "userId",au.id,au.nickname,au.avatar,DATE_FORMAT(aus.create_time,'%Y-%m-%d') as "createTime" from activity_user_sign aus LEFT JOIN all_user au ON aus.user_id = au.id where aus.activity_id = #{activeId} ORDER BY aus.update_time DESC limit 0,3
select user_id,status from activity_user_sign where activity_id = #{activeId}
